title: Peaceful, Tree-Lined Setting in the Heart of Houston
posting_body: Townhome Living in Uptown Houston, Easy Access to The Galleria, a Private Backyard Patio, Attached 2-car Garage
Large den/study, dramatic high ceilings, charming, arched windows & ample storage mean you always feel at home.
Sparkling swimming pool, wood burning fireplaces & luxury baths are features designed not only to make your life easy, but to make it luxurious.

Built-In Shelves - Hardwood Floors - Wood-Burning Fireplaces -   Full-Size Washers and Dryers - Generous Dressing Closets - Porcelain Tile - 9' Ceilings - Crown Molding - 2-Tone Paint - Intrusion Alarms - Gourmet Kitchens - Spacious Pantries - Side-by-Side Refrigerators - 2-Way Exposures - Luxury Baths - Oversize Windows - Patios and Balconies -
Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability
Perimeter fence, Hot Tub, Bus stop, Gated entrance, School bus stop, Pool

W/D machines, Self-cleaning ovens, Miniblinds, Custom built-ins, Ceiling fans, Garbage disposals, Cable ready, Garden/large tubs, Fire places, Storage closet outside, Private patios/balconies, Dishwashers, Microwaves, Hi-speed internet, Walk-in closets, Ice makers, Attached garages, Custom carpet, Intrusion alarms
